targets.expr: sum by (node, device) (node_network_carrier{device=~"$interface"} * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(group(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}) by (node, internal_ip), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

max by (node, interface) (
    node_nic_stats_speed{node=~"$node", interface=~"$interface"}
    or # if the device is only available from node exporter
    (
        label_replace(node_network_speed_bytes{device=~"$interface"}*8/1e6,
            "interface", "$1", "device", "(.*)")
        * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node)
        (label_replace(group(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}) by (node, internal_ip),
            "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))
)

panels.description: Scrape interval for node-exporter metrics (named node_network_*), average over last 15 minutes
panels.title: node-exporter rate

panels.description: Scrape interval for ethtool-exporter metrics (named node_nic_stats_*), averaged over the last 15 minutes
panels.title: ethtool-exporter rate

panels.description: Interfaces that aren't responding to pings (using CPingmesh).

targets.expr:
min by (host, nic) (increase(pingmesh_server_pings_total{host=~"$node", nic=~"$interface"}[5m]))
unless on (host, nic)
(pingmesh_server_healthy < 1)

panels.title: Reachability

targets.expr: sum by (node, device) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device=~"$interface"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

sum by (node, device) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device=~"$interface"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

sum by (node, device) (increase(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device=~"$interface"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

sum by (node, device) (increase(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device=~"$interface"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

sum by (node, device) (increase(node_network_carrier_changes_total{device=~"$interface"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(group(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}) by (node, internal_ip), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))

panels.title: NP ECN Marked RoCE Packets count

targets.expr: node_network_carrier_changes_total{device=~"$interface"} * on (instance) group_left (node) group by (instance, node) (label_replace(group(kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}) by (node, internal_ip), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)"))

panels.title: NP ECN Marked RoCE Packets count
